attributes.action: Renal dialysis patients be placed in ESA support group automatically
attributes.additional_details: Renal dialysis patients are been unfairly placed into the ESA WAG group with out consideration of the toll taken upon them by renal dialysis, and with out consideration on the toll this takes upon their health needs and care needs. We want to bring this to attention of the Government, and for a clause to be brought into the benefits system that all Renal Dialysis patients claiming ESA are placed automatically into the support group, given the disabling nature of their condition at stage 4.
